group_1.textRight: Yes. We've got no time to lose.
We need to clean up the problem in Chuo Ward@before we have any more casualties.
Right. Kanagi's cooperation is vital.
Yachiyo! Mifuyu!

group_1.textLeft: Calm down, Mel! We're talking about@something important.

group_1.textRight: But Kanagi's being really, really mean!
She actually thought I attacked someone!

group_1.textLeft: Tell us what happened. Start from the @beginning.

group_1.textRight: Mel, can we talk?

group_1.textLeft: I really wanna go over to Yachiyo's place.

group_1.textRight: Were you in Chuo Ward yesterday?

group_1.textLeft: I was taking make-up classes all day@yesterday, so I never left Daito Ward.
Speaking of which, it's so unfair!
Just 'cause I missed a few days of class, I@gotta do all my extra classes after school.

group_1.textRight: Do you have any alibis?

group_1.textLeft: He stood over me the whoooooole time,@staring at me so I couldn't get away.

group_1.textRight: Come with me.

group_1.textCenter: We're going to the teacher's office.

group_1.textLeft: But I wanna go see Yachiyo-senpai!

group_1.textRight: So you were telling the truth.

group_1.textLeft: Um, I'd really appreciate an explanation for@all that just now...

group_1.textRight: Hm? Oh, of course. Very well.
A Magical Girl was attacked by you in Chuo@Ward yesterday.
Yes, I know that now.
However, the girl who was attacked said...
It was someone who looked exactly like you,@and they said, "I am your enemy."
I know.
I'd be punishing you severely right now@if it had been.

group_1.textLeft: Meep! Th-then who was it?! Who's this coward@pretending to be me?!

group_1.textRight: If I knew that I wouldn't be asking you about@it right now.
I'm afraid the situation has become far more@complex than I ever thought...
